metadata.title: RZ/G2L, RZ/G2LC, RZ/G2UL, RZ/Five: Small area implementation solution

sections.content:
Question:
Is there any ultra-small, mass production-ready module solution?
Answer:
Our partner provides ultra-small modules that comply with the standard called OSM (Open Standard Module). In the 30x30 mmSq module, RZ/G MPU, PMIC, DDR-Memory, Flash-Memory and other components are mounted. Solutions provided by our partners are listed at RZ Partner Ecosystem Solutions. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rz-partner-solutions#quick-link-2846
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L, RZ/G2LC, RZ/G2UL, RZ/Five
